name: Totally Accurate Presidential Simulator
description:
Totally Acurate Presidential Simulator Best Played In Fullscreen

Totally Accurate Presidential Simulator (TAPS) is a carefully designed and meticulously developed game, perfectly reflecting the role as president in any developed nation. Make the difficult decisions too hefty for the public to grasp and balance the weight of expectations and reality, see if you have what it takes to be a great president.

In reality, this game was created and submitted for the GMTK 2022 game jam. The game is a light-hearted, choose your own adventure, narrative experience. With multiple endings and is packed full of jokes. This was a fun experience like every year and I hope, you had fun if you submitted a game, and have fun playing mine.
